Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its exceptional quality and versatility, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a price of $15000 for this exclusive opportunity. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
